loudspeakerFeatures.description: Designer inspired custom loudspeaker grilles are CNC fabricated in virtually any size, shape, material, color or finish.
For uncompromised sound quality and extraordinary look we use rare materials: Hardwoods, natural and artificial stones, aluminum, stainless steel, titanium and carbon fiber.
Vibration free speaker enclosures created with our proprietary material MBX105.
We understand that sometimes nothing should be seen. In that case, we make completely hidden speakers.
We engineer and manufacture amplifiers and signal processors that have no rivals in quality and precision.
Our engineering Team will do lots of calculations off-site and then travel to your home, yacht, or airplane to make the final calibration and tuning.
